error.signature: An error occurred (ServiceUnavailableException) when calling the X operation

verdict.summary: AWS service is temporarily unavailable. Usually a transient issue.

dead_ends.action: Switch to a different AWS service
dead_ends.why_fails: Likely a temporary issue — switching services is a massive change
The service is unavailable — waiting longer per-request doesn't help

workarounds.action: Implement exponential backoff with jitter and retry
Check AWS Health Dashboard for ongoing service incidents
If persistent, try a different AWS region as failover

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'An error occurred (ServiceUnavailableException) when calling the X operation' indicates an AWS service outage, while 'Stack is in ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state and can not be updated' indicates a CloudFormation stack in ROLLBACK_COMPLETE state.

'An error occurred (ServiceUnavailableException) when calling the X operation' indicates an AWS service outage, while 'An error occurred (AccessDenied) when calling the GetObject operation' indicates an IAM permission denial.
